name: pcgl_dac
description: DAC schema summarizing PCGL's DAC entity managed by Clinical Submission Service

schemas.name: dac

fields.name: dac_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the Data Access Committee (DAC).

fields.name: dac_description
fields.description: An in-depth description of the DAC, including its overall purpose, scope and responsibilities.

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: The full name of the primary contact person.  Please provide in the format: FirstName LastName E,g Jone Smith

schemas.description: A group fo individuals responsible for reviewing and approving or denying access requests to data based on established policies.
